name: Hackers (itch)
description:
Welcome to Hackers, a simple puzzle game! Hackers is a puzzle game where you move a square on across a grid as you try to reach the finish. It's not all that simple though.  With objects like boxes, gates, triggers, and transporters that get in your way,  the game requires some thinking.

NOTE: This game is designed for a Late 2016/Early 2017 MacBook Pro with the highest possible resolution. If you play this on a smaller display, the game will run fine, but if you play it on a larger screen, the game may not fill the entire screen.

If you would like to report bugs or have suggestions that will improve the game, please contact me at vieirast@icloud.com.
